comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of small trucks
- y: number of large trucks

Constraints:
1. 2x + 4y <= 30 (total number of people available)
2. x >= 10 (at least 10 small trucks)
3. y >= 3 (at least 3 large trucks)
4. x = 2y (number of small trucks must be twice as much as the number of large trucks)

Objective:
Maximize 30x + 50y (total amount of snow that can be transported)
